sentences.en: Cold Storage disinfection requirements ozone concentration 6 - 10 PPM , parking closures after the 24 hours above.

sentences.en: Note: PPM means part per million usually a measure of quality.

sentences.en: RESULTS: GSC contains the highest ( 11.18 % ) germanium in 5 ppm enriched germanium MS cultrue medium.
sentences.cn: 结果: 在5ppm的富锗培养基上培养的GSC中锗的转化率最高 ( 1118% ).

sentences.en: The 100 ppm level took effect June 1, 1994.
sentences.cn: 百分之一级生效1994年6月1日.

sentences.en: The legal limit of melamine in Hong Kong is 2.5 ppm.
sentences.cn: 在香港,产品的三聚氰胺含量法定上限为百万分之2.5.

sentences.en: The most effective concentration of bee royal jelly is about 400 ppm.

sentences.en: The term parts per million ( ppm ) was widely used but frequently led to misinterpretation.
sentences.cn: 广泛使用百分之几 ( ppm ) 表示结果,但常常引起误解.

sentences.en: This article presents a class for using PPM to compress a file.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了使用PPM的压缩文件一类.
